steps.name: user is able to navigate My Account successfully
user is able to click on Update names and cost centre link
user update the username "Test14" of any of one of the subscriptions and naviagte to Request Review page
user is able to submit the request successfully
user gets the request number and launches salesforce
user logins into salesforce using "sundaram.subramanian@o2.com.csupreprod" and "Mar@2018"
